author: ammulder
msg: Initial work on security.  More to come some other time.

author: rick
msg: Always pass in the $document-width to the emit() template.  Allows for
document width to be specified as a single variable.  May be able to
define this width in the future in the skinconf.

author: rick
msg: Somewhat better handling of nested elements by removing the explicit
template that matched text() nodes.  This template did it's own word
wrapping, which caused problems with nested elements.

author: parker
msg: Bug 3953: Provide better debug output for sa-learn --restore

author: dolander
msg: Checkpoint on the Id Transparency.  Move the core code into the IdMapper class.
Add support to the form for writing out the Base64 encoded map.
Add support to process populate to look for the map and use it if present
Stub in support for configuration of the feature
This feature is off at the moment
